plot: Police raid a Glaswegian Asian household. The son, Ali is arrested on suspicion of terrorism. A night of darkness for the family who go through an unraveling of secrets.
title: An Act of Terror
plot_es: Police raid a Glaswegian Asian household. The son, Ali is arrested on suspicion of terrorism. A night of darkness for the family who go through an unraveling of secrets.
plot_en: Police raid a Glaswegian Asian household. The son, Ali is arrested on suspicion of terrorism. A night of darkness for the family who go through an unraveling of secrets.
